text: Phir jab uss kay aur apnay dushman ko pakarna chaha woh faryadi kehnay laga kay musa (alh-e-salam) kiya jissa tarah tu ney kal aik shaks ko qatal kiya hai mujhay bhi maar dalna chahata hai tu to mulk mein zalim-o-sirkash hona hi chahata hai aur tera yeh irada hi nahi kay milap kerney walon mein say ho
